dn14:2.10.15_0: tvampi na dakkhissasi devaṁ vā deviṁ vā aññe vā ñātisālohite’ti.
dn14:2.10.16_0: ‘Tena hi, samma sārathi, alaṁ dānajja uyyānabhūmiyā,
dn14:2.10.17_1: sārathi vipassissa kumārassa paṭissutvā tatova antepuraṁ paccaniyyāsi.
dn14:2.10.18_1: vipassī kumāro antepuraṁ gato dukkhī dummano pajjhāyati:
dn14:2.10.19_1: yatra hi nāma jātassa jarā paññāyissati, byādhi paññāyissati, maraṇaṁ paññāyissatī’ti.
dn14:2.11.2_1: kumāro uyyānabhūmiyā abhiramittha, kacci, samma sārathi,
dn14:2.11.3_1: kumāro uyyānabhūmiyā abhiramittha, na kho, deva,
dn14:2.11.5_1: kumāro uyyānabhūmiṁ niyyanto mahājanakāyaṁ sannipatitaṁ nānārattānañca dussānaṁ vilātaṁ kayiramānaṁ.
dn14:2.11.7_1: mahājanakāyo sannipatito nānārattānañca dussānaṁ vilātaṁ kayiratī”ti?
dn14:2.11.9_1: yena so kālaṅkato tena rathaṁ pesehī”ti.
dn14:2.11.10_1: vipassissa kumārassa paṭissutvā yena so kālaṅkato tena rathaṁ pesesiṁ.
dn14:2.11.11_0: Addasā kho, deva, kumāro petaṁ kālaṅkataṁ, disvā maṁ etadavoca:
dn14:2.11.14_0: Na dāni taṁ dakkhanti mātā vā pitā vā aññe vā ñātisālohitā,
dn14:2.11.14_1: sopi na dakkhissati mātaraṁ vā pitaraṁ vā aññe vā ñātisālohite”ti.
dn14:2.11.16_0: mampi na dakkhanti devo vā devī vā aññe vā ñātisālohitā;
dn14:2.11.17_0: ahampi na dakkhissāmi devaṁ vā deviṁ vā aññe vā ñātisālohite”ti?
dn14:2.11.19_0: tampi na dakkhanti devo vā devī vā aññe vā ñātisālohitā,
dn14:2.11.19_1: tvampi na dakkhissasi devaṁ vā deviṁ vā aññe vā ñātisālohite”ti.
dn14:2.11.20_0: “Tena hi, samma sārathi, alaṁ dānajja uyyānabhūmiyā,
dn14:2.11.21_1: vipassissa kumārassa paṭissutvā tatova antepuraṁ paccaniyyāsiṁ.
dn14:2.11.22_1: kumāro antepuraṁ gato dukkhī dummano pajjhāyati:
dn14:2.11.23_1: yatra hi nāma jātassa jarā paññāyissati, byādhi paññāyissati, maraṇaṁ paññāyissatī”’ti.
dn14:2.12.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhumassa rañño etadahosi:
dn14:2.12.2_0: ‘mā heva kho vipassī kumāro na rajjaṁ kāresi,
dn14:2.12.2_1: mā heva vipassī kumāro agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbaji,
dn14:2.12.2_2: mā heva nemittānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ saccaṁ assa vacanan’ti.
dn14:2.12.3_1: bandhumā rājā vipassissa kumārassa bhiyyoso mattāya pañca kāmaguṇāni upaṭṭhāpesi:
dn14:2.12.4_1: yathā vipassī kumāro na agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyya,
dn14:2.12.4_2: yathā nemittānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ micchā assa vacanan’ti.
dn14:2.13.1_1: vipassī kumāro pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti.
dn14:2.13.2_1: vipassī kumāro bahūnaṁ vassānaṁ bahūnaṁ vassasatānaṁ bahūnaṁ vassasahassānaṁ accayena sārathiṁ āmantesi:
dn14:2.13.4_1: sārathi vipassissa kumārassa paṭissutvā bhaddāni bhaddāni yānāni yojetvā vipassissa kumārassa paṭivedesi:
dn14:2.13.5_0: ‘yuttāni kho te, deva, bhaddāni bhaddāni yānāni,
dn14:2.13.7_1: vipassī kumāro bhaddaṁ bhaddaṁ yānaṁ abhiruhitvā bhaddehi bhaddehi yānehi uyyānabhūmiṁ niyyāsi.
dn14:2.14.1_1: vipassī kumāro uyyānabhūmiṁ niyyanto purisaṁ bhaṇḍuṁ pabbajitaṁ kāsāyavasanaṁ.
dn14:2.14.7_1: pabbajito nāma sādhu dhammacariyā sādhu samacariyā sādhu kusalakiriyā sādhu puññakiriyā sādhu avihiṁsā sādhu bhūtānukampā’ti.
dn14:2.14.8_0: ‘Sādhu kho so, samma sārathi, pabbajito nāma,
dn14:2.14.8_1: sādhu dhammacariyā sādhu samacariyā sādhu kusalakiriyā sādhu puññakiriyā sādhu avihiṁsā sādhu bhūtānukampā.
dn14:2.14.9_1: yena so pabbajito tena rathaṁ pesehī’ti.
dn14:2.14.10_1: sārathi vipassissa kumārassa paṭissutvā yena so pabbajito tena rathaṁ pesesi.
dn14:2.14.16_1: sādhu dhammacariyā sādhu samacariyā sādhu kusalakiriyā sādhu puññakiriyā sādhu avihiṁsā sādhu bhūtānukampā’ti.
dn14:2.14.17_1: pabbajito nāma sādhu dhammacariyā sādhu samacariyā sādhu kusalakiriyā sādhu puññakiriyā sādhu avihiṁsā sādhu bhūtānukampā’ti.
dn14:2.15.3_0: Ahaṁ pana idheva kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajissāmī’ti.
dn14:2.15.4_1: sārathi vipassissa kumārassa paṭissutvā rathaṁ ādāya tatova antepuraṁ paccaniyyāsi.
dn14:2.15.5_0: Vipassī pana kumāro tattheva kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbaji.
dn14:2.16.2_0: ‘vipassī kira kumāro kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito’ti.
dn14:2.16.4_0: ‘na hi nūna so orako dhammavinayo, na sā orakā pabbajjā,
dn14:2.16.4_1: yattha vipassī kumāro kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
dn14:2.16.5_0: Vipassīpi nāma kumāro kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajissati, kimaṅgaṁ pana mayan’ti.
dn14:2.16.6_1: mahājanakāyo caturāsītipāṇasahassāni kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā vipassiṁ bodhisattaṁ agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitaṁ anupabbajiṁsu.
dn14:2.16.7_1: parisāya parivuto vipassī bodhisatto gāmanigamajanapadarājadhānīsu cārikaṁ carati.
dn14:2.17.1_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
dn14:2.17.2_0: ‘na kho metaṁ patirūpaṁ yohaṁ ākiṇṇo viharāmi,
dn14:2.17.3_1: vipassī bodhisatto aparena samayena eko gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭho vihāsi,
dn14:2.18.1_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa vāsūpagatassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
dn14:2.18.2_1: jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca,
dn14:2.18.2_2: atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṁ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassa,
dn14:2.18.3_0: kudāssu nāma imassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyissati jarāmaraṇassā’ti?
dn14:2.18.5_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṁ hoti, kiṁpaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti?
dn14:2.18.6_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.7_0: ‘jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṁ hoti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti.
dn14:2.18.9_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jāti hoti, kiṁpaccayā jātī’ti?
dn14:2.18.10_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.11_0: ‘bhave kho sati jāti hoti, bhavapaccayā jātī’ti.
dn14:2.18.13_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati bhavo hoti, kiṁpaccayā bhavo’ti?
dn14:2.18.14_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.15_0: ‘upādāne kho sati bhavo hoti, upādānapaccayā bhavo’ti.
dn14:2.18.17_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati upādānaṁ hoti, kiṁpaccayā upādānan’ti?
dn14:2.18.18_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.19_0: ‘taṇhāya kho sati upādānaṁ hoti, taṇhāpaccayā upādānan’ti.
dn14:2.18.21_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati taṇhā hoti, kiṁpaccayā taṇhā’ti?
dn14:2.18.22_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.23_0: ‘vedanāya kho sati taṇhā hoti, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā’ti.
dn14:2.18.25_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati vedanā hoti, kiṁpaccayā vedanā’ti?
dn14:2.18.26_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.27_0: ‘phasse kho sati vedanā hoti, phassapaccayā vedanā’ti.
dn14:2.18.29_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati phasso hoti, kiṁpaccayā phasso’ti?
dn14:2.18.30_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.31_0: ‘saḷāyatane kho sati phasso hoti, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso’ti.
dn14:2.18.33_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati saḷāyatanaṁ hoti, kiṁpaccayā saḷāyatanan’ti?
dn14:2.18.34_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.37_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati nāmarūpaṁ hoti, kiṁpaccayā nāmarūpan’ti?
dn14:2.18.38_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.39_0: ‘viññāṇe kho sati nāmarūpaṁ hoti, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpan’ti.
dn14:2.18.41_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati viññāṇaṁ hoti, kiṁpaccayā viññāṇan’ti?
dn14:2.18.42_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.43_0: ‘nāmarūpe kho sati viññāṇaṁ hoti, nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇan’ti.
dn14:2.19.2_0: ‘paccudāvattati kho idaṁ viññāṇaṁ nāmarūpamhā, nāparaṁ gacchati.
dn14:2.19.3_0: Ettāvatā jāyetha vā jiyyetha vā miyyetha vā cavetha vā upapajjetha vā, yadidaṁ
dn14:2.19.4_0: nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṁ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṁ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṁ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti,
dn14:2.19.6_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
dn14:2.20.2_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jarāmaraṇaṁ na hoti,
dn14:2.20.3_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.6_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jāti na hoti, kissa nirodhā jātinirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.7_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.8_0: ‘bhave kho asati jāti na hoti, bhavanirodhā jātinirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.10_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati bhavo na hoti,
dn14:2.20.11_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.14_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati upādānaṁ na hoti,
dn14:2.20.15_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.18_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati taṇhā na hoti,
dn14:2.20.19_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.22_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati vedanā na hoti,
dn14:2.20.23_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.26_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati phasso na hoti,
dn14:2.20.27_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.30_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati saḷāyatanaṁ na hoti,
dn14:2.20.31_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.34_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati nāmarūpaṁ na hoti,
dn14:2.20.35_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.38_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati viññāṇaṁ na hoti,
dn14:2.20.39_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.21.3_3: saḷāyatananirodhā phassanirodho, phassanirodhā vedanānirodho, vedanānirodhā taṇhānirodho, taṇhānirodhā upādānanirodho, upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhā jātinirodho,
dn14:2.21.5_1: vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
dn14:2.22.1_1: vipassī bodhisatto aparena samayena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī vihāsi:
dn14:2.22.2_0: ‘iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
dn14:2.22.3_0: iti vedanā, iti vedanāya samudayo, iti vedanāya atthaṅgamo;
dn14:2.22.4_0: iti saññā, iti saññāya samudayo, iti saññāya atthaṅgamo;
dn14:2.22.5_0: iti saṅkhārā, iti saṅkhārānaṁ samudayo, iti saṅkhārānaṁ atthaṅgamo;
dn14:2.22.6_0: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti,
dn14:2.22.7_0: tassa pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino viharato na cirasseva anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccīti.
dn14:3.1.4_0: ‘adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo.
dn14:3.1.5_0: Ālayarāmā kho panāyaṁ pajā ālayaratā ālayasammuditā.
dn14:3.1.6_0: Ālayarāmāya kho pana pajāya ālayaratāya ālayasammuditāya duddasaṁ idaṁ ṭhānaṁ yadidaṁ idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo.
dn14:3.1.7_0: Idampi kho ṭhānaṁ duddasaṁ yadidaṁ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṁ.
dn14:3.1.8_0: Ahañceva kho pana dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ, pare ca me na ājāneyyuṁ; so mamassa kilamatho, sā mamassa vihesā’ti.
dn14:3.2.1_1: vipassiṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ imā anacchariyā gāthāyo paṭibhaṁsu pubbe assutapubbā:
dn14:3.2.10_1: vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa paṭisañcikkhato appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāya.
dn14:3.2.11_1: aññatarassa mahābrahmuno vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya etadahosi:
dn14:3.2.12_0: ‘nassati vata bho loko, vinassati vata bho loko,
dn14:3.2.12_1: yatra hi nāma vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa appossukkatāya cittaṁ namati, no dhammadesanāyā’ti.
dn14:3.2.13_1: mahābrahmā seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya,
dn14:3.2.13_3: evameva—brahmaloke antarahito vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa purato pāturahosi.
dn14:3.3.1_1: mahābrahmā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā dakkhiṇaṁ jāṇumaṇḍalaṁ pathaviyaṁ nihantvā yena vipassī bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā vipassiṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ etadavoca:
dn14:3.3.2_0: ‘desetu, bhante, bhagavā dhammaṁ, desetu sugato dhammaṁ,
dn14:3.4.1_1: vipassī bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho taṁ mahābrahmānaṁ etadavoca:
dn14:3.4.5_0: “adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo.
dn14:3.4.6_0: Ālayarāmā kho panāyaṁ pajā ālayaratā ālayasammuditā.
dn14:3.4.7_0: Ālayarāmāya kho pana pajāya ālayaratāya ālayasammuditāya duddasaṁ idaṁ ṭhānaṁ yadidaṁ idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo.
dn14:3.4.8_0: Idampi kho ṭhānaṁ duddasaṁ yadidaṁ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṁ.
dn14:3.4.9_0: Ahañceva kho pana dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ, pare ca me na ājāneyyuṁ; so mamassa kilamatho, sā mamassa vihesā”ti.
dn14:3.4.10_1: imā anacchariyā gāthāyo paṭibhaṁsu pubbe assutapubbā:
dn14:3.4.19_1: paṭisañcikkhato appossukkatāya cittaṁ nami, no dhammadesanāyā’ti.
dn14:3.5.2_1: so mahābrahmā vipassiṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ etadavoca:
dn14:3.5.3_0: ‘desetu, bhante, bhagavā dhammaṁ, desetu sugato dhammaṁ,
dn14:3.6.1_1: vipassī bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho brahmuno ca ajjhesanaṁ viditvā sattesu ca kāruññataṁ paṭicca buddhacakkhunā lokaṁ volokesi.
dn14:3.6.2_1: vipassī bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho buddhacakkhunā lokaṁ volokento satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassāvine viharante,
dn14:3.6.3_0: Seyyathāpi nāma uppaliniyaṁ vā paduminiyaṁ vā puṇḍarīkiniyaṁ vā appekaccāni uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake saṁvaḍḍhāni udakānuggatāni anto nimuggaposīni.
